name: v1_passwordgenerator
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool password_generator_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Generate random passwords that are hard to guess. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/passwordgenerator
API description: Generates a random password string adhering to the specified parameters using the API Ninjas Password Generator API.

exclude_special_chars.description: Whether to exclude special characters(**!@#$%^&*()**) from the password. Must be either **true** or **false**. If not set, a default value of **false** will be used.

exclude_numbers.description: Whether to exclude numbers from the password. Must be either **true** or **false**. If not set, a default value of **false** will be used.

length.description: length of password in characters. If not set, a default value of **16** is used.
